value:
*yawn*$k$pNo, I'll take a bit more sleep, thank
you very much.

You wanna know what it's like where
I come from, eh?$k$pWell...all I have to say is this.
Everybody's equal there, no
matter their position.

Looks like you dropped your
firewood...$k$pNo, no, no. Those gloves are way too
stiff. Just rub some oil into 'em.
That'll get 'em nice and snug.

You sure put in the hours. Ever heard
of "work-life balance?" If you ever
want to loosen up, I'll teach you.

My talent is sleeping. I can fall
asleep anywhere—on the floor,
in a tree, on my wyvern...$k$pIf you find me, please... Don't wake
me up, OK?

I'm here in $Nf's
place. I brought the good stuff.
Wanna knock one back?

This is no good. If I stand out, you're
going to put me on the front lines,
aren't you?

Just how I like it—somebody else will
pick up the slack.

Sometimes, it's hard to stay
motivated, isn't it? Can't have that...

*sigh* Guess I can't slack off,
huh? Oh, well.

I'm Haar. You might be surprised
to hear I run cargo. If you want
something, just ask my partner.

Oh, so it's you. Here to interrupt
my nap once again, are you?$k$pLook, it's not like I dislike you. I
just need my space. Dealing with
people is—*yawn*—pretty tiring.$k$pI'll get the job done, of course. But
in my spare time, I like to be left to
my own devices.$k$pYou remind me of somebody. You're
both way too serious, and give your
all to get things done...$k$pI'm not going to babysit you, but I do
have your back. I'll rest a lot easier if
I know you're doing OK.
はっ
well well
うああっ！
Hmpht
Up and at 'em, partner!
Come on, then.
This won't go well for you.
Show me what ya got.
General Shiharam... I...
Haha
*yawn* Boy, I'm bushed. Mind if I sleep? How's a nap sound?
Huh? Sorry, nodded off for a second there.
I've got a delivery to make, and this cargo's really heavy. I'm getting sick of taking orders.
You work pretty hard. I'd better cut down on the naps if I want to keep up.
I was proud to fight for my General.
Do what's best for you. Just don't trample over people you care about to do it.
Whatever happens, let's make sure we survive this, huh?
Uh huh.
Fine, what's next?
*sigh*
